content.detailedDescription: My 16 year old son reports having witnessed the above while at a retreat in robbins lodge in davie florida at approximately 3pm on saturday, feb 23, 2008. he became scared when he saw it and has not been able to erase it from his mind.
content.summary: My son witnessed 3 black oval objects hovering in the sky -going slow

content.detailedDescription:
At first i thought it was just a high flying plane, but then i realized it was moving far too quickly to be a plane because of how high it appeared.  it had at least 3 different colored light on the front of the craft that could be positioned differently (known only because one appeared to shine in our direction and became very very bright for a short time.)  it took no more than a second or two to start at the western edge of the sky to as far east as i could see.  as it passed us the 3 brighter lights faded away and all we could see was a red-ish light on the back of the craft.

it moved all the way across the sky and then came to a complete halt.  the red light appeared like a star off in the distance and had i not seen it just previously move i wouldn't have known the difference.  it stayed there for a long while.  at first we all thought it had completely stopped moving, but i kept my frames of reference and noticed it was slowly rising off in the distance.  we went inside when a cloud covered it only to come back out an hour later and see it much higher in the sky.

while watching it we noticed 2 planes fly overhead that shared none of the characteristics of the object we had seen.  they were headed towards hobby airport (which was at an angle of nw towards se while the craft moved directly from west to east.)  the planes were loud and easily identified as airliner jets as we could see them clearly because of all the light from the near full moon.
content.summary: Quick moving lights brightened then came to a dead stop and slowly rose.

content.detailedDescription:
Witness report from report form #1 - general sighting cases

"i walked out of the house with a couple of friends to their car. as they were entering [their] car, 2 very bright red [orbs] came slowly from the wnw to the ese, from my left side.

i pointed up at them and said "ufo's" to my friends but because of the cold weather (approx. 32��� f). they did not look. thinking i was joking, perhaps. they drove away without looking.

when reports came out in the newspapers my friend called me on the phone to ask what i had seen.

they [the objects] made no noise. there was no sign of heat waves.

they were very stable objects even though there was a 20-30 mph  wind, as there was a norther blowing in at the time."
content.summary: Two red half-oval objects

content.detailedDescription: We own a ranch and for the past six years there has been things in the sky with pulsating lights that can move straight up and down and diagonal or move miles away within a split second. the neighbors i have talked to have also noticed. when i first noticed them six years ago they were more towards monarch pass, now they are across the field over our other house and also over the hill across our road. we see them mostly in the summer but they have been around alot this winter.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: See at night when not cloudy

content.detailedDescription:
We photographed and video filmed a oval object hovering and moving around the sky while walking on rockaway beach,new york on feb 16th,2008 at 3:30pm. it was beautiful clear day and the almost full moon was larger than normal and very visible in the daytime which was unusually visible,that drew my attention to a circluar object flying near the moon.It my camera and my girlfriend also had her camra so we started takin photos! it dissapeared for a while then came back. jfk airport is very close and the airplanes land in the same area as the ufo was flying,i have adozen phots detailed photos one has the ufo and an airplane in the same shot! this object was watched by me and my girlfriend for abot 20 minutes before it went out of the atomsphere. 

this is important: i reasearched on youtube and someone else had witnessed a ufo in the same area months before my sighting,i believe it is the same ufo. please research on youtube.Com ufo footage at jfk airport.
keep in mind the ufo this fellow filmed was 7minutes after takeoff which will bring the sighting over rockaway beach, queens!

important: research on google ufo sighting at rockaway beach,new york...And yet another person from 2005 has spotted a ufo ,but they have no photos.

one more thing the ufo we saw and filmed looks like the one on youtube.Com search diamond shaped ufo! please look at this and see the idenity..
       you need to zoom in on these photos i have 2 videos and a dozen more photos if your interested in seeing them i will send them!
content.summary: Saturday afternoon stroll on the ach takin photos of each other then spotted a ufo

content.detailedDescription: There were six of us in the parking lot of neba's rest. on 163rd st.&collins ave. we were sitting in a 56 chevy in the parking lot when we saw it about 40'ft. in the air glowing red from the center and flying like it had a gyroscope inside it. we got out and ran up to a security guard patrolling the lot to try and stop any drug dealing going on, when we pointed it out to him and said to call the police or air force he looked at it as if he saw it all the time and said "no way" because they would think he was crazy. collins ave. is a four lane road with a median strip in the center which is where it was flying over, there was bumper to bumper traffic and i noticed a couple walking down the sidewalk so i ran up to them and pointed it out and that's when it really got strange because they looked at it and just said, "oh yea" and kept on talking to each other and walking. that's when i knew something weird was going on so i ran back to my friend's standing by the guard and decided to look at it closely because i thought this may be the only time i would get to see something like this and i better stare at every detail because i might never get to see one again (which turned out to be true by the way) so because i'm an artist i did just that and that picture will be in my mind forever because it was way too perfect to be built by us, especially in 1970. i have painted it several time's now, it took a long time to get the facts that no one would believe me or my friend's either, but i finally did and know for sure we are not alone in this universe...
content.summary: 30'dia. polished silver, glowed red from center, flame from bottom, teattered at 10mph.

content.detailedDescription:
I was about to get in my vehicle heading to work about 10 min. to 11p.M.
when i notice to bright lights through the trees coming from the east heading to the west coming straight over my home. at first, because i live close to a military base, ithought it was the new apache helicopters withthe advanced whisper mode engaged, but as the objects cleared the tree tops over my home there was no sound at all, and if you know anything about whisper mode on the apache there is still quit a bit of noise.
and if you know anything about optics you know the difference in search lights and a shear glow, but none of this was obvious until they cleared the trees into open sky!
the objects (two) were approx. 5 to 8 meters in diameter and approx. 15 meters above the trees. relative speed was about 25 knots until they made a slow escillon movement to the south and in a split second they vectored 90 degrees straight up into space much faster than any mach number we've ever achieved!
no human could survive such exceleration, at least not at our present state of knowledge!
my feelings about this? amazed and disappointed.
amazed at the knowledge required to create a machine which could do this.
disappointed because they didn't stick around. i mean, they could either stop to make contact or either attack, didn't matter to me was prepared for either! but i just don't think they came all this way to pick a fight!
i think they were just surveying.
the one thing i do believe though is that there had to be a mother ship in space possibly on the dark side of the moon, because the two craft although very agile and fast i do not believe they were large enough to produce enough enery for interstellar travel. enough to travel to mars and back in an hour but not to reach our nearest star which is about 4 light years away!
content.summary: Two bright spheres flew over my home then turned 90 degrees straight up into space at incredible speed!

content.detailedDescription: Looking west above the tree tops i saw a curcular bright white light traveling due north at a very fast rate of speed. there was no trailer visable to me.  the light was on the landing approach of the madison airport.  i have seen numerous planes thru there, but never near the speed that the light traveled. after the brief moment of the sighting i tried to find some logic in what i saw.  there was no way i could judge the distance or size.  the size, if in my hand at arms length, was like a orange. me.. seeing a ufo can't be was my thought at the time, howerver, just what was it??  any ideas??                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   my location is madison wi.  sighting from west window at 110 schenk st.  it appeared to be near hwy 151 going north.                                                                                     sorry i made no notation as to date or timeof the event.  it was in early december around 8.00 pm
content.summary: Brilliant white circle;straight horizontal flight; fast speed

content.detailedDescription:
i was in front of our house at approx. 10:00pm,  watching the total lunar eclipse through my binoculars.  i noticed to the east,  a very bright light appear on the low horizon.  i glanced at it through the binoculars,  seeing an array of colors emmitting.  as it drew closer,  my girlfriend came out to see the eclipse.  i told her to watch the light in the eastern sky.  we both continued to observe the light as it drew closer.
  i looked at it through the binoculars repeatedly.  it had a bright light in the front and one behind.  i estimated it's altitude to be approximately 8 to 10,000 ft.  it made no sound.  as it flew directly overhead,  i say again,  it made no sound.  there is an airport near and jets fly over frequently.  even at higher altitudes,  the jets are audible.  this craft proceeded in a direct east to west path.  as it was overhead,  i looked at it and focused my binoculars.  i could see the shape of this craft. it was a long cylindrical shape,  with a rear glowing area,  and a glowing appendage in front,  kind of cresent shaped.   this was not an airplane,  jet,  helicopter,  sattellite,  star,  bird,  or any kind of meteor.  
  even my girlfriend was puzzeled as we discussed the lack of sound from the craft.  i asked her later to draw a picture of what she saw.  i did as well,  and our recollections were extremely close. there weren't any of the faa required green and red marker lights whatsoever.  no strobes.  
  the lights were a constant glow,  very bright with varying color.  i was am still convinced that this wasn't any craft known.  the part that reaaly gets me, as well as my girlfriend,  is that it made no sound. no sound at all.  it just smoothly glided over. the craft just flew in a western direction and disappeared, just as it appeared.  very strange.  i must say,  that i was very excited at this sighting.  i've often seen strange things in the sky,  but this was the best view i've ever encountered.  
  now,  the next day,  i was watching the morning local news.  there was a report that on that night,  people had witnessed strange lights over the saginaw bay,  out a ways over the ice...Above the ice.  they reported the lights to the local coast guard post in essexville, mi,  but the coast guard found nothing.  it still rides heavy in my mind,  this sighting.  i know what i saw,  as well as what my girlfriend witnessed.    we both agreed to what we witnessed as being real,  not an illusion.  it was as real as the lunar eclipse itself.  i hope that i see this again.  i do believe that we are being visited,  but like many others,  need proof to solidify the belief.  i think i have my proof.
duff tinglan
hemlock,  mi
content.summary: Long cyclinder w/ forward appendage(illuminated). rear of craft illuminated.

content.detailedDescription:
Light shot at constant level across the sky from east to west at extreme high rate of speed. no tail, lost sight in tree line. was traveling with the horizion, not falling out of the sky.  what could this have been???






1.)  driving home

2.)  bright light came out of the tree line

3.)  a plane at first, but then it didn't make sense at the speed it was going.

4.)  traveling at high rate of speed across the horizon.

5.)  i was stunned

6.)  it disappeared into the tree line to the west.
content.summary: Bright white (led looking)  pea sized light at thumbs distance

content.detailedDescription: My friend and i were leaving the gym in seekomk mass and were droping of his cousin in an apartment complex in east providence r.I. when leaving the two of us noticed what we at first thought was a blinking red light on a water tower.I noticed a light moving and when we got to the street the light was in front of us and that shocked us because we thought that it was a new tower that maybe they had just built. we could"nt believe what we were seeing so we started to follow this light. we were on broadway and it was flying over the trees.We kept on chasing this thing in and out of all different side streets as it was flying over the houses. after we got on to vetrans parkway thats when it flew over the water. at the same time there were a lot of police racing towards riverside.We continued in and out of streets and end back on to broadway and stopped to see where it went and it was gone so we drove on broadway and then we saw it again and chased the blinking red light for another 10 min.Then we decided to go home but all of a sudden it was in front of us and started to follow us. at first we were excided and wanted someone other than us to see this so i called my friends at the bowling ally on newport ave. but they didn't believe us.We thought that maybe it would follow us ther and i told my friends to come outside to see this light , this light always stayed in front of us. as we wre turning into the parking lot we lost sight of it so we parked  and were going to go in and get our friends to see this. when we got out of the car we were looking for it and then we saw in the sky a white light and started to come over the lanes. thats when i saw that it was a golden bronze submarine shaped object with a sort of big hump on the top. as we were walking  toward the doors all of a sudden both of us thought that we would just go back t the car which we did. when we got into the car we were both so tired and fell asleep. when we woke up we left the parking lot to go home. on the way we stopped and both of us had to vomit. our friends were coming by and saw us vomiting and thought that maybe we were drinking but we weren't.
content.summary: Followed us and saw a golden bronze looking submarine shape  ufo

content.detailedDescription:
The location is rockingham county, nc and the time is 6:45 pm on 1/7/08. i was standing approximately ten feet from a level paved rural road in front of a house.  the area was very dark as it is rural and there was no moon and no nearby street lights or security lights in the area (sunset was 5:22 pm).  the night sky was clear and the temperature was around fifty degrees.  i was looking directly across the road at a small field on the opposite side of the road when in the right side of my vision i saw small lights approaching.  i turned toward them and saw four lights. the lights were gold and about the size of an orange. they were almost reflective but, they didn't light the ground below them nor seemed to have a focused beam. they descended slightly then leveled off and traveled about four feet above the road surface in my direction.  i would estimate their speed at about fifteen mph, maybe faster at the first sighting, but they slowed as they neared me. when i first saw them they were about one hundred fifty feet from me and at a height of about seven feet. i knew they were over the road because there are cedar trees along a fence line on the opposite side of the road.  i could not have seen them had they not been over the road or the side shoulder because the trees would have obscured my view.  they were in a line one behind the other.  the first two were about 30" apart followed by the second two, also about 30" apart. the second pair was separated from the first pair by about ten feet. when they were about sixty feet from me they began to oscillate up and down from 3-6 feet above the road.  they continued this vertical oscillation along the road until they were nearly directly in front of me but on the opposite side of the road.  then they stopped and came to level flight (all four).  they hovered, without any movement at all, about four feet above the road.  again there was one pair about 30" apart and approximately ten feet to their right was the second pair also about 30" apart. they held this position for about four seconds.  then they dimmed greatly, probably 95%, and descended to the ground. after settling to the ground they had a pinkish orange glow with lavender or purple/pink spokes radiating from the center. they appeared to be translucent, maybe glassy or gelatinous. i scanned quickly at all four to verify that they were all there. then, i  stared totally at the second one from the left because it was the brightest or at least sat highest in the grass about 6" from the side of the pavement. after about four seconds they dimnmed all the way out and could no longer be seen in the darkness.  total time of this event, fifteen seconds.



the above are the simple facts of what i saw. however, i would like to describe my thoughts as this occurred from moment to moment. when i first saw the lights i thought people were either biking or skateboarding in my direction.  as they approached and began to oscillate up and down i thought the people were possible jogging. again i thought- people.  i started say "hey".  just as i was about to get "hey" out of my mouth they stopped and began to hover. i looked into the background around the lights to look for the outline of people. but there were no- people. and up until that very moment it never occurred to me that it was anything but- people causing the lights.  as soon as i thought out loud incredulously, "gosh no people" the lights dimmed and lowered to the ground. only at the realization that there was no one there did i become a "good" observer. i stared intently at the four objects on the gound and watched until they were no longer visible. i looked on with astonishment and thought to myself "what in the world have i just witnessed?" whether they disappeared, vaporized, or simply flew away into the darkness i have no idea.

until this event, i have never given ufo's much thought. however since 1/7 i have thought of hardly anything else. i had never googled anything even remotely related to the subject. now i google hardly anything unrelated to the subject.  to demonstrate my lack of ufo curiosity, when the four lights dimmed and were no longer visible, i didn't even look up at the sky! i now wish that i had looked up.

mufon- kennethh
bubbaandoz@aol.Com
content.summary: Four  small lights glided in, occillated, hovered, changed form,lowered to the ground and disappeared

content.detailedDescription: My husband and i turned left from the mall road on towerline road going south. a brightly lit large light in the sky low in the sky. just above these tall electrical towers. hung in the sky stationary. then started to move north east. huge bright bright undercarriage lights. red strobe light, center appeared metalic. one solid triangular piece. we rolled down our windows traveling slow could not hear any sound. we went south and then turned around on a side road to watch it continue north east across the top of pekin, illinois. by that time it should have been over lake arlan on the south side of pekin. there was a police officer parked going north at the side of the road helping a stranded motorist. surely he saw it. had to have. also there were a line of cars behind us who shoud have seen it. it was truly awesome. now we live in central illinois and in this area the people here truly don't like to talk about this sort of thing. only wish i had my camera with me. my feelings on this, i've had my own experiences but this time my husband was with me as a witness. he kept saying what is that. doesn't look like a plane to me. then he got excited. he said he was a little jealous that i always see things and this time he got to have his own sighting.This all lasted about 5 minutes.
content.summary: Large,the size of a jet. triangular brightly lit. silent , red strobe, stationary then started to move n.E.

content.detailedDescription:
I was out at night(fri-feb-8th-2008) to take pictures of our old large tree. we captured some strange things on film on our sony digital camera. the last picture i took that night, was a face of an alien with open mouth. i have no idea why it looks green what's going on? when i took the photo and looked at it briefly on the camera, i thought it was an apparition of a soldier with an army helmut. then when i uploaded the photo to my computer, i saw what looked like a green alien face with very large eyes and mouth open. looks like i just caught the right half of it's face and torso. i think the flashes of many pictures attracted it, then when it came closer, the first smaller flash startled it,it opened it's mouth in a panick then the main big flash caught that site/expression.(back in the summer of aug-07, i had an encounter with a very large star-light craft, that flew silently over the huge tree on my street right in front of my house, i waved/flagged it down, it came towards me very low to the ground and i ran towards it, my friend came out of the house and towards me, the craft saw him approach and it took off the other direction going east of orillia,ont,canada. since then,nothing has happened,that i know of..There were however pictures in the local newspaper of crafts the week before i saw mine.)
 when i took my photo's, i made sure i held my breath when i took each shot. there was no smoke,bright lights or fog around. this photo is just one of 4 amazing pictures that really need to be checked out by professionals.
what do you think this is?
the second shot was taken the night before by my 14 year old daughter. if you lighten the exposure,you clearly see a skeletal being with it's head turned. there is a spine and neck,head,face and either wings or shoulders.
please take a look and let me know what you think?
thankyou.
ms.T.B
content.summary: Caught a picture of an alien being face and torso

content.detailedDescription: Some of them have brilliant white lights at the tip of one or both wings. some of them are silent, and the silent ones are closely accompanied by other lowflying, very loud aircraft, a tactic doubtlessly used to hide the silence of the former. i have noticed little white orbs darting about near some of the crafts as well. and they're everywhere. as soon as one makes it's way to the horizon, two or three more appear from other directions. i've talked to many observant people who have been watching these aircraft, and everyone agrees that it is very strange. i'd say most people don't care enough to notice, or are simply to distracted by their own amusements to stop and wonder. people look at me like i'm crazy when i stop in the street to observe the crafts. i'd love to connect with other aware austinites regarding this phenomenon. my email is thetansbeware@yahoo.Com
content.summary: Dozens of large, slow moving, low flying aircraft are indeed patrolling the austin skies nightly.

content.detailedDescription:
2/20/08: last night at about 9:05 i went out to look at the lunar eclipse and noticed 2 orange bright lights. i live in northwest chicago and it looked like the lights came in from the east, but traveled from north to south over the downtown chicago. it was a very clear night.

i would describe what i saw as 2 bright orange objects travling at a slow speed. i estimate they were about 8-10 miles away from me.I had a pair of binoculars with me.I didn't see any kind of craft outline but just the lights. there wasn't any after glow.They were roundish, about the size of a softball from where i was at and travling side by side.They stayed at one speed. they traveled exaclty even with each other until the very end of my sighting before disappering into the horizan.My guess was they must have been about 3000-5000 feet above ground. not high in the sky. i would say they took about 10 minutes or so to travel across the city. they weren't flying like an aircraft but more like they were floating very smoothly. near the end of the sighting one of the crafts seem to go out of line to the east and came back to fly with the other craft. then they were out of sight heading to the south.
content.summary: 2 very bright orange lights

content.detailedDescription: When i was 16 i was outside my house in texas in the backyard, my brother had reminded me it was going to be a lunar eclipse that night and i was bored and i am fascinated by stuff like that so i went to watch. i'll say the eclipse was about one quarter completed when i sat down on my small back porch and started watching, then about three quarters through the complete blackout of the moon, i notice to my right [coming from an easterly direction heading west] some lights. of course i wasn't thinking hey what's that! houston's not far and we get a lot of planes buzzin around. so i glanced over and immediatly i noticed something odd about it. no blinking lights. just 3 white lights. i still didn't think much of it so i continued to glance back and forth from the moon to the object[s?] cruisin along the skyline. it started to bother me quite a bit, because i've always been a bit of a skywatcher for weird stuff like this, and i had the twinge in my head like, man don't take your eyes off this you never know. and then it passed between me and the moon. dead silent. nothing there. just....Lights. 3 lights, a perfect triangle. not blinking. then it took off, and not like you see in the movies, like instantly to warp 9, it was like a rev up from slow to light speed, but it hung long enough for me to see sort of a trail. and it kind of lit the clouds on the horizon a bit, like in passing. then something went after it. a purple/blue cylinder[beam?] with a sort of tail behind it. and that lit the sky up for real. followed suit after the ufo, same direction. i've seen something very similar to this in a video that's been aired of a nasa sts mission in which a ufo was traveling over the earth and it veered suddenly following a sort of flash and streak of light seeming to be aimed at the ufo.  while the ufo was in my sight, and for quite some time after the events, like maybe 5-10 minutes i was absolutely mortified. slack-jawed, scared to breathe, maybe i thought they could see me, who knows. but after i composed myself, i went inside and grabbed my brother's camcorder and went outside to see if maybe some more freaky stuff would happen. no more activity.
content.summary: Lunar eclipse ufo 1996 southeast texas

content.detailedDescription: These "objects" have been patrolling the austin skys since at least 1/9/08 which was the first time i saw one.  they emerge around dusk and buzz around until app. 10pm.  they are so frequent and exceptional i find it hard to believe that more people aren't reporting them.  they usually track from the north to south but the really big ones almost always come from the west to east.  70% of them hug the tree lines and roof tops.  here's a detailed image of the rear-end of one that shook my house wed. eve.  enjoy.
content.summary: Detailed view

content.detailedDescription:
This summer as i went back for a summer break to my family home, in france in the rhone alpes region which is a region about a third the size of california, with montaneous topography.
the county where my family home is is called loire mainly made of countryside, with a couple of big towns.My home is in a hilly region surrounded by a lot of woods as you can see on the pictures, with very few houses around within 1 miles radius.

the picture was taken as i was walking early in the morning taking pictures of the surrounding of my home, it must have been about 8.30am when i took  that particular picture, not being aware of the flying object/bird you can see on the upper left of the pix. i took this picture using a digital camera (panasonic)  on a wide angle.When i came home i quickly downloaded/ batch/formatted all the pictures on my laptop and look briefly at all those pictures, but this picture didn���t cath my attention.
it���s only 6 months after taking that picture when browsing for these pictures that i came across that weird black ans white spot you can see, and it did catch my attention this time for two things:
-the perspective makes it really hard to figure out what it can possibly be:
a bird of whatever size will be much blurry and only small birds would fly with their wings stuck o their sides as the shape of the object would suggest, and if it was a bird then it will be much blurrier on the pictures, and much much smaller as well, as when looking at the object it looks like it is at least some distance away, so if it was a bird it would have to be at least a one meter long bird to appear like this on the pictures, and no bird of that size exist in that region.
a plane or glider, could make more sens to me, but the perspective again makes it difficult to clearly identify this object as a winged flying object, and also if it was then i think that the shape would have been clearer.
also the oval/disc shape is very intriguing as unless taking by profile front or beside you would see the back fin, and an airliner at least will leave a track of smoke behind it.
the last thing is that when you zoom the pix in your photo browser (in window) you can see that there���s some type of metallic roof or white roof with some shadow below it, which suggest a spheric object.
you however really need to zoom in to get a clear idea of what i���m taking about.
so i���m perplex as to what this thing could possibly be.
content.summary: Disc-like ufo snapped on a camera in france august 2008

content.detailedDescription: Set up my camera with fish eye scope to take pictures of strange clouds around 12 noon, took these pictures around 12:30 and noticed strange bright light in cloud, kept camera fixed on it and it seemed to lower itself and turn a blackish color as it descended. it made no noise and when i checked the lens for debris,there was none and took picture immediately afterwards showing dark orb. looked at with naked eye and although it was smaller was still visable and non moving but had slight haze around it,no lights blinking but alternated between black and silver color before becoming smaller and disappearing(i believe it ascended). i had reported seeing these things to mufon before with pictures and close up shots taken since november. when i would do a certain old special prayer it would show up within minutes. i stopped after having very bad nights of feeling being watched and/or looked at late in evening and during sleep. i am hoping it does not start up again, but i have to let people know to look up. again i do not care if anyone believes me or not, i just want there to be documentation if something happens.
content.summary: Set up my camera with fish eye scope and caught ufo

content.detailedDescription: I'm not the witness, but you may want to go to youtube and type in "ufo dallas", and then hit the most recent button. 3 people recorded something that almost looks cgi, but since 3 people captured it, you may want to check it out. also type in "ufo new york" and hit the most recent button. 2 people captured this one. it too almost looks fake, but like the dallas ufo, it may be worth checking out since it too was recorded by more than one person. both incidents happened last night during the eclipse.
content.summary: 3 record dallas ufo, 2 record new york ufo

content.detailedDescription: i was employed as a health care aide. i was working a twelve hour shift caring for an elderly woman in her home. the house is located along the ocean up on a bluff with a wonderful view of the pacific ocean from every room in the house. the night was crisp, cold, and clear. the ocean was very still and also calm.It almost seemed like i was looking at a lake. out side the house looking over the ocean is a magnificent small island of clifs and rocks. in the winter the island is home to hundreds of sea lions. the noise is ear splitting and incedible at the same time. this was the last full moon of 1999. the entire night i kept look out at the wonderful sight. the night was so bright it was almost like day light. i first noticed the then star shaped object in the sky. it kept shinning and spinning with colors of red,white,greenand blue.  i kept watching it through out the evening in fact, it seemed i could not help noticing how much it was twinkling. from about 9:00 p.M. to midnight i was awake then i slept until 4:00a.M. i woke up to help my patient to the restroom i helped her back to bed and then i sat on the edge her bed and looked out at the view.So once more the star shaped object was there spining out the window in the sky. the whole time when i observed this star spinning shape i would squint at it the shape would change to a cigar shape form. so in my mind i looked at it as if it was far away and by squnting i brought it closer. so at some point i thought o.K."your are not a star show me your stuff." amazingly the object did respond as if i caught it in the act. so sure enough this sphere started spinning and then it slowly started moving out over the ocean. at this moment i realized watching the cigar shape was closer than it appeared earlier. so this star ship proceeded to continue going slowly out over the ocean. then it seemed to stop and a cone shaped light showed down on the ocean and it seemed like there were small round orb like objects comming and going from the big ship. then it would glide over the ocean and shine another cone shape light over the ocean. then proceed out farter at this time it seemed the moon was starting to set and the sky was getting lighter. what i observed next was  a very fire red round orb came out of the ship and seemed to be comming back over to where the sea lions were and the red orb disappeared behind the rock island. at this point it seemed like i had watched for maybe two hours. i guess i was a little freaked out that the red light was comming back my way and i had had my fill for the night. so i went back to bed and i went to sleep. afterword i have felt that who ever was on this ship made me think this ufo was way more interested in the ocean and maybe the sea lions. i felt honored to have wittnessed this sight and it made me wonder if we some how are allowed to see other dimentions if we slow down enough at 4:00 am.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path then hovering
content.shape: Cigar,  Cone,  Circle,  Cylinder,  Disc,  Fireball,  Star-like
content.summary: I wittnessed a ufo over the pacific ocean  on the last full moon of 1999.

content.detailedDescription:
So, my algebra teachers parents were camping.  and for three nights they would see a green, glowing ball gliding just above the tree line.  thin it would stop, and zoom off at an enormous speed.  the whole thing lasted about three seconds.
                           this was at night time.
content.summary: I wasn't a first hand encounterer.  but my algebra teacher's parents saw a green light hovering above the tree line.

content.detailedDescription: I want to know the type of resources that may be available to people who want to report an incident/experience but are afraid that they will be scrutinzed and or harrassed by government agencies.
content.summary: I want to know what happens to a person who reports something.

content.detailedDescription:
Sorry to report this so late after the date (1986). i am currently 35 years of age, professional telecommunications systems engineer. 

i was 14 at the time and was with my parents who also witnessed the event.
my mother and i are in complete agreement as to what we saw.

it was the first week of august 1986. we vacationed for 2 weeks every year at the outer banks, nc (nags head, kill devil hills). one night the stars were out and there was good visibility of the night sky. we were sitting out on a picnic bench facing the ocean. the ocean was calm as a lake. 

from the south moving very slowly north were 2 very extremely long triangular craft flying. i couldn't give you an estimated altitude. they flew in parallel with the coastline. each point was marked by a red light. the red light was not exceptional - what incredible was the size of blackness that blocked out the night sky. i can't quite put enough emphasis on how huge the "footprint" of these craft was in the night sky. there was nothing else in terms of colors, lights, etc. the triangle was acute and much longer than wide. there was no point of reference but we had an unobstructed view of these things.

these craft were both silent. but, i do remember sort of a very low frequency hum that was felt more than heard. it is very difficult to explain how the low frequency sound was barely audible and you could easily have not heard it if you were not paying attention to what was happening. but, in terms of any other sounds or noises the craft were completely silent.

these two craft very slowly worked their way north and that was it. i mean we sat there for an hour pointing at and talking about these two craft and we spent all of the time just trying to understand what it was we were looking at.

we didn't have cell phones back then or even a phone in the beach cottage we rented so we were at a loss in terms of reporting it.

well, i wanted to report this. of my 35 years this was my one ufo sighting. i keep my eyes on the sky but have not seen one since. i am not a pilot nor have any special training at looking at or understanding objects in the night sky. but, i thought this might be of value for your records. hopefully, maybe someone else will come forward with their report to mufon that will corroborate my report.

thank you,
jason
content.summary: 2 very long black triangles (each one at least 1 mile long)

content.detailedDescription:
I was walking in my neighborhood in the evening around the beginning of twilight, when in my peripheral vision to the right i saw light which i first thought must be a comet because there was no sound at all. it came immediately into my view and was very close, about twice as high as a tall palm tree. the shape was elonagated and there were colors swirling around the front in the direction it was traveling, which was south.

then suddenly it disappeared and and i was left with a quiet twilight evening, a couple of stars just beginning to come out. i had no feelings or reactions because it wasn't there long enough for me to react. i was just very disappointed afterwards that it didn't stay longer and that no-one was with me to share the experience.
content.summary: Elongated shape, very close....Not very high, colors swirling around the front, completely silent.

content.detailedDescription:
my husband and i were on our way to the movies and heading toward the laughlin strip on the highway  95 coming from kingman, az when my husband  who was driving said ���what is that?��� i looked up and there was a plane flying across in the distance  directly in front of us. i told him it was plane, obviously.  he said ���not the plane, where did it go?���, then exclaimed and pointed ���that!��� i leaned forward in the truck to look up into the sky thru the windshield and  at the upper left side i saw a metallic disc shaped object which was brightly reflecting the sun. it was tilted at an angle toward us and didn���t seem to be moving at all but staying in one place while it tilted at those various degrees. we couldn���t tell if it made any sound or not because our windows were rolled up. i watched it for a few seconds in shock that i was seeing my first beyond a shadow of a doubt ufo , till i realized i had my camera with me and i told my husband to pull over on the side as its visibility was lost from me where i was sitting and digging in my bag for my camera. when we got to an area and pulled over it was gone and no where to be seen anywhere in the sky. we stayed there for a while looking for it and hoping it might come back or maybe still be there and show itself again, but nothing. 
   i asked my husband about it and he said the reflection of the suns rays reflecting off of the shiny silver metal caught his eye and he look up  and saw it. at that time it was completely turned on its side so that he could see it was a perfectly shaped round disk. it was so close that it was about an inch in size and we could see the grooves where it had a small bump in the middle of it. as my husband was looking at it and asking me what it was, it turned ���right��� side up where he lost it for a second then it became ���visible��� again (and when i saw it), when it tilted at an angle and the suns rays reflected off of the metallic body again. 
   the only other ufo that i, personally have seen and video taped was when we lived 30 miles out of kingman, arizona which was oval shaped and light in color but was pretty far away and was reported on the news that day to be seen all over arizona (phoenix, flagstaff, kingman etc) but it was explained as being a weather balloon. now that one i would accept a lot more easily as possibly being a weather balloon but this ufo we saw yesterday was so clear, detailed and in broad daylight on a nice sunny day that we both (my husband and i) know it was real and like nothing we both have ever seen before that could be logically explained.
content.summary: Ufo stationary/alternating angles in laughlin, nv 2/16/08 at 1:50 pm

content.detailedDescription: I was outside my house looking at the finale of the lunar eclipse. to the lower right (south east) i saw what i thought was an ufo. at first i thought it was an airplane in a holding pattern because i am about 20 miles from the airport. but the flashing lights are what i found odd. the lights were outlined and flashed back and forth. after a couple minutes it just disappeared sideways.
content.summary: Object seemed to hover. lights were flashing in a row, back and forth

content.detailedDescription: Disc shaped no noise was about 300 feet from the road and about 300 feet in the air..No electrical malfunctions to my car  or radio etc..Watched it for about 3-5 minutes it..Circular lights on the bottom going round and round totally silent..It went due south approximately 30-40 mile in seconds..Stopped again being in the desert it was very plain to see even at distance..I watched it about 3-5 more minutes, it then went due west about 30-40 miles once again in seconds, stopped all the while with the flshing lights below going round and round.. finally it went straight up and out of sight in dissapeared in seconds.....This was the first time i saw anything like this and i lived in vegas around military installations and saw all kinds of aircraft..Also because i was in the military myself....The next time i saw a craft ..Actually 2 out side las vegas about the year 1997 above lake meade one at.. i worked for the national serat this time. and was on my way back to park from vegas.. was dropped off by  a friend a couple of friends and would walk or wait for someone to pass by because on this road it is the only road to enter the park from this area... about 8pm the sun just set it just got dark after they dropped me off i looked towards the lake and over  lake meade at both end of the lake i noticed 2 triangle shaped objects about 3-5 miles from me i was far enough to look left and right and the two craft were brightly lit  they looked just like the old rubics cubes....Not the first ones..That were square but the newer ones that were triangular and very brightly lit ....No noise once again ...To my back about is nellis air force base ..Many times i saw many jets and other aircraft take off and land after flying above on manuvers  both day and night  time and even from way farther away i could always here them...I then heard a prop plane take off the base on its wings there were pylons with strobe lights at this time not on...No visable lights either the plane approached the one ufo circled about halfway then turned on its strobe lights the ufo wnet crazy with lights flashing backand forth almost like the two were sending messages ...I heard the pane but not the ufo after totally circalling the craft the air force plane took the lead and the craft folloed and they flew due south and out of sight all this took about 15 minutes... the plane was a military plane the ufo who knows.. i then looked to the other end of the lake for the other but it had dissapeared... i was picked up by another park employee and told them and many others about this event...
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Driving to a casino on the nevada/utah border between salt lake and border city off the hwy. app. 300ft above and off hwy. no noise so close i thought i could throw a rock and hit it...Got out   of my car watched it it flew south about 30-40 miles in sec.

content.detailedDescription: My mother called me last night from missouri telling me about an object that both she and my father saw in the sky about 5pm on 2/20/2008.  she described it to me as a white long cigar shaped object that did not have wings or a tail fin like on a normal aircraft.  when she saw the object she ran inside to get the binoculars and returned outside the object was still there in the sky moving slowly to the north.  when she looked through the binoculars she said it did not have any windows, was flying lower than an air craft and did not have a jet stream after it as it flew.  i sked her if perhaps it was a blimp and her reply to me was that it wasn't as round as a blimp and was flying higher than a blimp normally would.  i then asked her if it was a space shuttle knowing that one was supposed to have landed sometime yesterday and she again siad it had no wings and no tail fin.  i was just curious to report her sighting to someone and see if anyone could give us an explaination or if any other individuals had reported a similar sighting.  any information you could give me on this would be greatly appreciated.
content.summary: Long cigar shaped object without wings, windows or tail fins
